org.interpss.numeric.sparse.impl
Class SparseEqnDoubleCommonMathImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base.AbstractSparseEquation
      org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base.AbstractSparseEqnDouble
          org.interpss.numeric.sparse.impl.SparseEqnDoubleCommonMathImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SparseEquation, SparseEqnDouble
public class SparseEqnDoubleCommonMathImpl
extends AbstractSparseEqnDouble

Sparse Equation of data type double for solving the [A]X=B problem. using the apache common math lib. It is for illustrating extension implementation.
